name: Wasted Worlds
description:
The foreman has had enough. He’s taken a lot of crap from
the boss over at Mega Dump Corp. Now it is your turn
to turn a ruined outfit into a thriving business and
restore the health of the planet! As you grow your operation bigger,
you will take on challenges on other planets. Beware though,
a dark secret lurks on the planet’s surface.





Wasted Worlds is a garbage management action adventure.

You can build structures for waste management from a
3rd person (Top Down) perspective and then protect them with various
weapons that you can find or buy on the planet.

Use vehicles to traverse the surface of each planet faster, or to
help you push trash into incinerators or recyclers.

Take care of the planet, and you will see it return to its original glory.
Follow an interesting storyline that evolves as take on new missions
and contracts.



Unique Waste Management system
Planet Terraforming
Day/Night System
Co-op Multiplayer mode 'Garbage Run'
Top Down/3rd person Combat/Action
3 different planets to explore
Special weapons and upgrades for each planet
Strategy based building
Lots of exploring, unique items to find
Various vehicles to use and operate
